dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO is one of the largest and most commonly used datasets for referring image segmentation, containing 19,994 images with 142,210 referring expressions for 50,000 objects, collected from the MSCOCO dataset via a two-player game.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO+ dataset contains 141,564 language expressions with 49,856 objects in 19,992 images, excluding some absolute-location words to increase the challenge compared to RefCOCO.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: Varun K Nagaraja
Vlad I Morariu
Larry S Davis
dcterms:description: G-Ref includes 104,560 referring expressions for 54,822 objects in 26,711 images, with natural expressions collected from Amazon Mechanical Turk, featuring longer sentences with more descriptive content.
dcterms:title: G-Ref

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan

dcterms:description: MSCOCO is a large-scale dataset containing images of common objects in context, widely used for various computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO
